configuration.title: Installed Status
configuration.description: Tells if the module is installed or not

configuration.title: Enable PayPal IPN Module
configuration.description: Do you want to accept PayPal IPN payments?

configuration.title: Display Order
configuration.description: Display Order. Lowest is displayed first.

configuration.title: Payment method visible
configuration.description: Where is this payment method visible: Admin, Catalog or Both )

configuration.title: Payment Zone
configuration.description: If a zone is selected, only enable this payment method for that zone.

configuration.title: Set Order Status
configuration.description: Set the status of orders made with this payment module to this value

configuration.title: Accepted Checkout Method
configuration.description: Allow this payment module to be used for (Rental membership signup, Normal checkout or Both )

configuration.title: E-Mail Address
configuration.description: The e-mail address to use for the PayPal IPN service

configuration.title: Gateway Server
configuration.description: Use the testing (sandbox) or live gateway server for transactions?

configuration.title: Force shipping address?
configuration.description: If TRUE the address details for the PayPal Seller Protection Policy are sent but customers without a PayPal account must re-enter their details. If set to FALSE order is not eligible for Seller Protection but customers without acount will have their address fiels pre-populated.

configuration.title: Transaction Currency
configuration.description: The currency to use for transactions
configuration.set_function: tep_cfg_select_option(array('Selected Currency','Only AUD','Only CAD','Only CHF','Only CZK','Only DKK','Only EUR','Only GBP','Only HKD','Only HUF','Only JPY','Only NOK','Only NZD','Only PLN','Only SEK','Only SGD','Only USD'),

configuration.title: Set Preparing Order Status
configuration.description: Set the status of prepared orders made with this payment module to this value

configuration.title: Set PayPal Acknowledged Order Status
configuration.description: Set the status of orders made with this payment module to this value

configuration.title: Set PayPal Completed Order Status
configuration.description: Set the status of orders which are confirmed as paid (completed) to this value

configuration.title: Transaction Type
configuration.description: Send individual items to PayPal or aggregate all as one total item?

configuration.title: Move tax to total amount
configuration.description: Do you want to move the tax to the total amount? If true PayPal will allways show the total amount including tax. (needs Aggregate instead of Per Item to function)

configuration.title: Page Style
configuration.description: The page style to use for the transaction procedure (defined at your PayPal Profile page)

configuration.title: Debug E-Mail Address
configuration.description: All parameters of an Invalid IPN notification will be sent to this email address if one is entered.

configuration.title: Enable Encrypted Web Payments
configuration.description: Do you want to enable Encrypted Web Payments?

configuration.title: Your Private Key
configuration.description: The location of your Private Key to use for signing the data. (*.pem)

configuration.title: Your Public Certificate
configuration.description: The location of your Public Certificate to use for signing the data. (*.pem)

configuration.title: PayPals Public Certificate
configuration.description: The location of the PayPal Public Certificate for encrypting the data.

configuration.title: Your PayPal Public Certificate ID
configuration.description: The Certificate ID to use from your PayPal Encrypted Payment Settings Profile.

configuration.title: Working Directory
configuration.description: The working directory to use for temporary files. (trailing slash needed)

configuration.title: OpenSSL Location
configuration.description: The location of the openssl binary file.
